comments: Reflection of array in A054123 about vertical central line.Starting with g(0) = {0}, generate g(n) for n > 0 inductively using these rules:  (1)  if x is in g(n-1), then x+1 is in g(n); and  (2)  if x is in g(n-1) and x < 2, then x/2 is in g(n).Then g(1) = {1/1}, g(2) = {1/2,2/1), g(3) = {1/4,3/2,3/1}, etc. The denominators in g(n) are 2^0, 2^1, ..., 2^(n-1), and T(n,k) is the number of occurrences of 2^k, for k = 0..n-1. - _Clark Kimberling_, Nov 09 2015
